resources.string: Unlock this by creating a deck
Deck must have 4 cards selected and a name with at least 3 and a maximum of 15 characters.

Navigate to Deck screen. Select \'Create Deck\' page. Give the deck a name. The name must at least 3 characters long and a maximum of 15 characters. Then select 4 cards from the list of cards to be put in your deck. Finally press the \'Create Deck\' button. You can view your created decks in the \'Your Decks\' view by selecting the deck you want to inspect. You can also delete your deck by pressing the \'Trashcan\' icon.

In the map screen you can start you hunt for monsters. First you must have created at least one deck, if you haven\'t you are guided to make one. Monsters are spawned around you location, you can see them as icons on the map. When you near a monster that you want to fight press the button on the top left of your screen. Before the battle begins you see the monsters name, element and health points. Now you must a choose a deck you want to use in the battle, choose wisely and take into account the monsters element.

In the Augmented Reality battle screen you fight monsters with the deck of your choosing. You have 4 turns to defeat the monster before it flees. The turn counter is in the top left corner of the screen. To attack the monsters tap the card you want to play. Using a card uses a turn and damages the monster. Tackle card can also daze the monster, if the monster is dazed it will be displayed in the center of the top screen. Monsters health points are displayed in the top right corner of the screen. When the monsters HP reaches 0 you have won the battle and are awarded with Experience points. You level up when you have acquired enough Exp points.
When using an elemental card that the monster weak to, you do 2x the cards damage. If the monster is also dazed you do 3x the cards damage.
Light is strong against dark and weak against dark.
Dark is strong against light and weak against light.
Water is strong against fire and weak against electricity.
Fire is strong against wind and weak against water.
Wind is strong against earth and weak against fire.
Earth is strong against electricity and weak against wind.
Electricity is strong against water and weak against earth.
Physical attack card dazes the monster. Making it vulnerable to follow up attacks.
